org.apache.juneau.rest

Interface RestCallHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RestCallHandler.Null
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public interface RestCallHandler
    Class that handles the basic lifecycle of an HTTP REST call.
    Deprecated - Use RestContext.REST_context and override methods.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  RestCallHandler.Null
      Deprecated. 
      Represents no RestCallHandler.

      • execute

        void execute(HttpServletRequest r1,
             HttpServletResponse r2)
      throws ServletException,
             IOException
        Deprecated. 
        The main service method.
        Parameters:
        r1 - The incoming HTTP servlet request object.
        r2 - The incoming HTTP servlet response object.
        Throws:
        ServletException - Error occurred.
        IOException - Thrown by underlying stream.

      • createCall

        RestCall createCall(HttpServletRequest req,
                    HttpServletResponse res)
        Deprecated. 
        Wraps an incoming servlet request/response pair into a single RestCall object.
        Parameters:
        req - The rest request.
        res - The rest response.
        Returns:
        The wrapped request/response pair.

      • createRequest

        RestRequest createRequest(RestCall call)
                   throws ServletException
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a RestRequest object based on the specified incoming HttpServletRequest object.
        Parameters:
        call - The current REST call.
        Returns:
        The wrapped request object.
        Throws:
        ServletException - If any errors occur trying to interpret the request.

      • createResponse

        RestResponse createResponse(RestCall call)
                     throws ServletException
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a RestResponse object based on the specified incoming HttpServletResponse object and the request returned by createRequest(RestCall).
        Parameters:
        call - The current REST call.
        Returns:
        The wrapped response object.
        Throws:
        ServletException - If any errors occur trying to interpret the request or response.

      • handleResponse

        void handleResponse(RestCall call)
             throws Exception
        Deprecated. 
        The main method for serializing POJOs passed in through the RestResponse.setOutput(Object) method or returned by the Java method.
        Parameters:
        call - The current REST call.
        Throws:
        Exception - Can be thrown if error occurred while handling response.

      • handleNotFound

             throws Exception
        Deprecated. 
        Handle the case where a matching method was not found.
        Parameters:
        call - The current REST call.
        Throws:
        Exception - Can be thrown if error occurred while handling response.

                 Throwable e)
          throws Exception
        Deprecated. 
        Method for handling response errors.
        Parameters:
        call - The current REST call.
        e - The exception that occurred.
